pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api.annotations

Annotation Type ClientActionClass


  • @Target(value=TYPE)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface ClientActionClass
    Classes marked with this annotation are considered as Bristleback Client Action Classes. Client action classes are high level mechanism, allowing sending messages to client using Java methods. To enable client actions, Bristleback intercepts client action classes methods and transparently sends messages to client.

    Created on: 2012-05-26 10:34:25

    Author:
    Wojciech Niemiec
    See Also:
    ClientAction

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String name
      Custom client action class name.

    • Element Detail

      • name

        public abstract String name
        Custom client action class name. Names should fallow normal Java classes naming conventions, e.g., should start with Capital letter, contain only alphanumeric characters, etc. If custom name is not specified, client action class simple name (Class.getSimpleName()) is used.
        Returns:
        custom action class name.
        Default:
        ""
